page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
{Farms}provide employment for some people in the more rural part of the block though probably not as many as there used to be due to{mechanisation.
Other employment is provided by the town of{Andover,}particularly the {varied,}mainly{light industries}based on the{Portway}and{Walworth Industral {Estates}. In addition the headquarters of the{Trustee Savings Bank}is another important employer.
{Unemployment}is a major national problem though the area suffers less severely than elsewhere with an approximate unemployment rate of 8%.
